scripts.css-html-js: npm run css-build && npm run html-build && npm run build:js
scripts.css-html: npm run css-build && npm run html-build
scripts.build-all: npm run css-build && npm run html-build && npm run build-img && npm run build:js
scripts.css-build: node-sass --omit-source-map-url src/styles/_all.sass dist/css/main.css && npm run minify-all
scripts.build-img: imagemin src/assets/*.jpg --out-dir=dist/img && imagemin src/assets/*.ico --out-dir=dist/ && imagemin src/assets/*.png --out-dir=dist/img && imagemin src/assets/*.svg --out-dir=dist/img
